mapper.select: select count(*) from files where title like concat('%',#{key},'%') and (#{part} = '' or part = #{part})
select*from files where title like concat ('%',#{key},'%') and (#{part} = '' or part = #{part}) order by id desc limit #{paging.displayRow} offset #{paging.startNum}
mapper.insert: insert into files (userid, name, title, originalname, savedname, part) values (#{userid}, #{name}, #{title}, #{originalname}, #{savedname}, #{part})
